title: Kirara Fantasia
opening_song: "Torchlight ~Yume no Akari~ (Torchlight ～夢の灯り～)" by KiraraQuintet [Kirara (Tomori Kusunoki), Lamp (Marika Kouno), Clea (Azumi Waki), Polka (Matsui Eriko), Cork (Yuuki Kuwahara)]
sinopse: Kirara Fantasia is a mobile fantasy RPG using characters from the manga magazines under the Manga Time Kirara brand. Animated advertisements and promotions were made for the game and streamed on Aniplex's official YouTube channel.
